seo: 插件,Disable Strict CSP,MITM,CSP策略替换
summary: 该插件通过修改HTTP响应头，将Content-Security-Policy替换为default-src *，从而禁用严格的CSP策略以支持MITM攻击场景。
summary_en: This plugin modifies the HTTP response header to replace the Content-Security-Policy with default-src *, thus disabling strict CSP policies for MITM attack scenarios.
